field.fieldname: (select count(*) from OAMyWorkFlow a left join OAworkFlowTemplate b on a.TableName=b.templateFile where a.createBy=OAMyWorkFlow.createBy and a.currentNode='0' and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)>=@condition:BillDate_s and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)<=@condition:BillDate_e and b.templateClass like '00002%')

(select count(*) from OAMyWorkFlow a left join OAworkFlowTemplate b on a.TableName=b.templateFile where a.createBy=OAMyWorkFlow.createBy and a.currentNode!='0' and a.currentNode!='-1' and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)>=@condition:BillDate_s and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)<=@condition:BillDate_e and b.templateClass like '00002%')

(select count(*) from OAMyWorkFlow a left join OAworkFlowTemplate b on a.TableName=b.templateFile where a.createBy=OAMyWorkFlow.createBy and a.currentNode='-1' and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)>=@condition:BillDate_s and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)<=@condition:BillDate_e and b.templateClass like '00002%')

(select count(*) from OAMyWorkFlow a left join OAworkFlowTemplate b on a.TableName=b.templateFile where a.createBy=OAMyWorkFlow.createBy and a.flowDepict like '%red%' and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)>=@condition:BillDate_s and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)<=@condition:BillDate_e and b.templateClass like '00002%')

SQL.text: select vbCrLf OAMyWorkFlow.createBy as EmpID,vbCrLf tblEmployee.EmpFullName as EmpFullName,vbCrLf (select count(*) from OAMyWorkFlow a left join OAworkFlowTemplate b on a.TableName=b.templateFile where a.createBy=OAMyWorkFlow.createBy and a.currentNode='0' and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)>=@condition:BillDate_s and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)<=@condition:BillDate_e and b.templateClass like '00002%') as Xinjian,vbCrLf (select count(*) from OAMyWorkFlow a left join OAworkFlowTemplate b on a.TableName=b.templateFile where a.createBy=OAMyWorkFlow.createBy and a.currentNode!='0' and a.currentNode!='-1' and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)>=@condition:BillDate_s and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)<=@condition:BillDate_e and b.templateClass like '00002%') as approved,vbCrLf (select count(*) from OAMyWorkFlow a left join OAworkFlowTemplate b on a.TableName=b.templateFile where a.createBy=OAMyWorkFlow.createBy and a.currentNode='-1' and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)>=@condition:BillDate_s and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)<=@condition:BillDate_e and b.templateClass like '00002%') as finish,vbCrLf (select count(*) from OAMyWorkFlow a left join OAworkFlowTemplate b on a.TableName=b.templateFile where a.createBy=OAMyWorkFlow.createBy and a.flowDepict like '%red%' and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)>=@condition:BillDate_s and convert(char(10),a.applyDate,120)<=@condition:BillDate_e and b.templateClass like '00002%') as OutFinshTimevbCrLffrom OAMyWorkFlowvbCrLfleft join tblEmployee on tblEmployee.id=OAMyWorkFlow.createByvbCrLfleft join OAworkFlowTemplate on OAMyWorkFlow.TableName=OAworkFlowTemplate.templateFilevbCrLfwhere 1=1 vbCrLf and (convert(char(10),OAMyWorkFlow.applyDate,120) >=?)vbCrLf and (convert(char(10),OAMyWorkFlow.applyDate,120) <=?)vbCrLf and (OAMyWorkFlow.departmentCode =?)vbCrLf and (tblEmployee.EmpFullName like '%'+?+'%')vbCrLf and (OAworkFlowTemplate.templateClass like '00002%')vbCrLfgroup by vbCrLf OAMyWorkFlow.departmentCode,vbCrLf OAMyWorkFlow.createBy,vbCrLf tblEmployee.EmpFullNamevbCrLfvbCrLf vbCrLf
